Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BmKn2L1 (BmKn2 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Bea Rde L, Petraglia AF, Johnson LE. 2015
Literature.Title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and toxicity of analogs of the scorpion venom BmKn peptides

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toparent peptide BmKn2L: 23%, I=F=A: 15%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213, B.cereus ATCC 11778, three Gram- bacteria: S. typhimurium ATCC 14028 (weak), E.aerogenes ATCC 13048 and E.coli ATCC 25922.Structure: random coil in water and become helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 ~10 ug/ml, hemolytic.
